channel.title: Please answer and help!
channel.description:
:mad: CAN SOME1 TELL ME HOW TO MAKE MY SERVER: GO ONLINE. MAKE NPCS SELL ITEMS. MAKE NPCS DROP ITEMS. CHANGE THE EMOTES TO LIKE BANK, FOOD, ARMOR ETC. HOW TO MODIFY ::STARTER SO I CHOOSE WHAT ITEMS YOU GET IF U TYPE IT. MAKE IT SO SKILLS ARENT MAXED. HOW TO MAKE NEW STARTING AREA. HOW TO MAKE A CLIENT. HOW TO MAKE NPCS SAY STUFF LIKE "RARES HERE" "FOOD HERE" ETC. HOW TO MAKE SOME EMOTES TO TELEPORTS. HOW TO MAKE UNLIMITED ENERGY. HOW TO MAKE GOLD SPAWN AND STAY UNTIL SOME1 PICKS UP. HOW TO MAKE MINIGAMES LIKE "PEST CONTROL" "BARBERIAN ASSAULT." HOW TO CHOOSE PRICES FOR ITEMS FROM NPCS. HOW TO MAKE PEOPLE ABLE TO DO "POH."
PLEASE ANSWER AT LEAST 1 WHEN U READ THIS SO AGAIN CAN PEOPLE ANSWER JUST COME OF THESE QUESTIONS.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 10, 2007, 11:45:42 AM[/size][hr]OH AND HOW DO I MAKE THE SERVER IP TO BE "NO-IP.INFO."

item.title: Please answer and help!

item.description:
@lilspace12 wrote:

CAN SOME1 TELL ME HOW TO MAKE MY SERVER:
GO ONLINE.
MAKE NPCS SELL ITEMS.
MAKE NPCS DROP ITEMS.
CHANGE THE EMOTES TO LIKE BANK, FOOD, ARMOR ETC.
HOW TO MODIFY ::STARTER SO I CHOOSE WHAT ITEMS YOU GET IF U TYPE IT.
MAKE IT SO SKILLS ARENT MAXED.
HOW TO MAKE NEW STARTING AREA.
HOW TO MAKE A CLIENT.
HOW TO MAKE NPCS SAY STUFF LIKE “RARES HERE” “FOOD HERE” ETC.
HOW TO MAKE SOME EMOTES TO TELEPORTS.
HOW TO MAKE UNLIMITED ENERGY.
HOW TO MAKE GOLD SPAWN AND STAY UNTIL SOME1 PICKS UP.
HOW TO MAKE MINIGAMES LIKE “PEST CONTROL” “BARBERIAN ASSAULT.”
HOW TO CHOOSE PRICES FOR ITEMS FROM NPCS.
HOW TO MAKE PEOPLE ABLE TO DO “POH.”
